Invocation Name: a. i. chat
des:
AI Chat is a knowledgeable and entertaining artificial intelligence designed to engage you in natural, human-like conversations. Whether you're curious, seeking answers, or simply in the mood for witty banter, AI Chat offers an experience that's as engaging as chatting with a friend. 

Key Features:

 * There are no magic words you have to use. Just speak freely.
 * Delivers quick responses for a smooth chat experience.
 * Works with all Alexa devices, no extra hardware, accounts, or permissions are needed.
 * Provides on-screen captioning of user utterances and AI responses for devices like the Echo Show, ensuring clarity and avoiding confusion.
 * AI Chat uses GPT (Generative Predictive Transformers), with interchangeable models ensuring flexibility.
 * Spoken responses are concise by default, usually a single sentence.

Disclaimers:

 * Training data is current up to October 2023 and may not include information or events beyond that date.
 * While designed for accuracy, AI Chat makes mistakes. Verify critical details independently.
 * This skill is designed for human interaction and is not intended for use by automated systems, bots, or scripts. Misuse may result in access restrictions.



Starting and Stopping:

Launch AI Chat by saying, "Alexa, open AI Chat," and exit at any time with commands like "Alexa, exit" or "Alexa, quit."

FAQ

"Can AI Chat remember past conversations?"

Briefly. AI Chat does not remember past conversations, but it does recall the last few exchanges to preserve context.

"Why does this skill keep shutting down?"

Amazon Alexa Devices typically stay open for just a few seconds of inactivity. If disconnected, simply relaunch the skill; it remembers the short-term context.



Privacy Policy

We value your privacy. AI Chat does not share or sell your data to any third party. 

We use the collected data to:
 * Generate responses during conversations.
 * Enhance the skill’s performance and user experience.
 * Monitor and diagnose issues or errors.

For detailed information on how we manage your data, please visit our full privacy policy at www.nadaware.com/privacy-policy.
